Bathe in the hot springs in this city.

content=Fugaku Gunjo is a place where you can enjoy watching the sea, dine on great food and enjoy a nice hot spring. Each room has a private open-air bath so you can enjoy the view of the sea while taking a bath.

(Izu002),  03-3666-0068. Offers comfortable cottages. This property is located in Syuzenji about 10 mins drive from Shuzenji station. There are many types of rooms. Terraced cottages for 2-10 people, Deluxe detached houses for 10-20 people. All properties have kitchen and hot spring, and partially outdoor bath. You can also enjoy BBQ if you want. Off-peak season 6200 yen per person (room for 2), Peak-season 13700 yen per person (room for 2).
Fushimi Izunagaoka Station, Approx. 20 minute walk or 3 minute by taxi

)+81 81-55-948-1225. A spa hotel with 8 independent cottages with a taste of traditional Japan. These guest rooms (tea-ceremony house style) are high valued architectural beauty, starting at ¥21,735 per person for five guests up to ¥48,300 per person for 2 guests.
address=439 Nashimoto, Kawazu-cho, Kamo-gun, Shizuoka, Japan 413-0501
content=Unryu is a tea house-style ryokan (Japanese Inn) which covers an area of approximately 9,900 square meters and features a special walking trail that is exclusive for guests.
